{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Dovado |model=4GR |revision= |upc= |ean=2724261998835 |asin=B003XR6BO6;US;, B003XR6BO6;DE; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/14/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=Discontinued |type=wireless router |fcc_id=X7V6291103270 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=A3S12D40ETP-G5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192SE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=DOVADO, |default_ssid_regex=^DOVADO$,,, ^DOVADO-[A-F0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''USB Mobile Broadband Router''
[http://www.dovado.com/images/Firmware/4GR-Reference_manua62X.pdf Manual] "1244-0000674-01Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The Serial Flash is on the back of the board. [http://communication-devices.tech-specs.com/dovado-4gr-n57215647 On '''Tech-specs.com'''] (w/ board shot) :"1244-0000674-01Z" is again silkscreened on the board ('''Edimax''' P/N). :A3S12D40ETP-G5 RAM chip (64 MB) [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/dovado-4gr-gigabit-usb-wireless-n-router-1506 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] The manual specifies the default SSID as '''DOVADO'''.
